t: The*p oracle of Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.
A*pn jealous and avenging God is the Lord;*s The*ln Lord*s is avenging and wrathful. The*ln Lord*s takes vengeance on His adversaries, And*ln He reserves wrath for His enemies.

The*ln Lord*s is slow to anger and great in power, And*ln the Lord*s will by no means leave the*i guilty*i unpunished. In*ln whirlwind and storm is His way, And*ln clouds are the dust beneath His feet.
He*ln rebukes the sea and makes it dry; He*ln dries up all the rivers. Bashan*ln and Carmel wither; The*ln blossoms of Lebanon wither.
Mountains*ln quake because of Him And*ln the hills dissolve; Indeed*ln the earth is upheaved by His presence, The*ln world and all the inhabitants in it.
Who*ln can stand before His indignation? Who*ln can endure the burning of His anger? His*ln wrath is poured out like fire And*ln the rocks are broken up by Him.
The*ln Lord*s is good, A*ln stronghold in the day of trouble, And*ln He knows those who take refuge in Him.
But*ln with an overflowing flood He*ln will make a complete end of its site, And*ln will pursue His enemies into darkness.
Whatever*ln you devise against the Lord,*s He*ln will make a complete end of it. Distress*ln will not rise up twice.
Like*ln tangled thorns, And*ln like those who are drunken with their drink, They*ln are consumed As*ln stubble completely withered.
From*ln you has gone forth One*ln who plotted evil against the Lord,*s A*ln wicked counselor.
Thus*p says the Lord,*s “Though*pn they are at full strength*i and likewise many, Even*ln so, they will be cut off and pass away. Though*ln I have afflicted you, I*ln will afflict you no longer.
So*ln now, I will break his yoke bar from upon you, And*ln I will tear off your shackles.”

The*ln Lord*s has issued a command concerning you: “Your*ln name will no longer be perpetuated. I*ln will cut off idol and image From*ln the house of your gods. I*ln will prepare your grave, For*ln you are contemptible.”

Behold,*ln on the mountains the feet of him who brings good news, Who*ln announces peace! Celebrate*ln your feasts, O Judah; Pay*ln your vows. For*ln never again will the wicked one pass through you; He*ln is cut off completely.
